channel.title: Waf on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Waf on Edd Mann

item.title: Unlocking the AWS WAF Logs
item.description: In this post we discuss our recent move to route all requests through CloudFront. This allows us to parse all traffic through the AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF). We highlight the reasoning behind this change, and some issues and remedies encountered when trying to garner concrete logs from the WAF instance.
